meanings.definition: A type of Mexican sandal with a woven leather upper.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new huarache for the summer.
meanings.sent2: The huarache was comfortable and stylish to wear.
meanings.sent3: The huarache danced off my foot and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her huarache was like a cozy blanket for her feet.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the huarache caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A dish consisting of a fried masa base topped with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a huarache topped with beans and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was their delicious huarache dish.
meanings.sent3: The huarache on my plate looked like a tasty work of art.
meanings.sent4: The flavors in the huarache exploded in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the huarache made my stomach growl in anticipation.
